issue.title: rakuten.dropgame.jp
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Ads) [https://rakuten.dropgame.jp/drop/play/top](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Frakuten.dropgame.jp%2Fdrop%2Fplay%2Ftop) ### Comment > 件名：広告が表示されるホームページ > > AdGuard.com御中 > > いつもお世話になってます。 > > お問い合わせ番号「1147661」で今まではよかったのですが、 > 下記のホームページでゲームを実行すると、広告が表示され > てしまいます。一昨日にゲーム運営会社が対応してきました。 > フィルタをいろいろ有効/無効に設定しましたが、広告が表示 > されたり、空欄になったりして、無くなりませんでした。 > > リンク： > https://rakuten.dropgame.jp/drop/play/top > > → 楽天ゲームなので、アカウントを作った上で、下記リンク > https://pointmall.rakuten.co.jp/ > から、「ゲームで貯める」→「ぷくぷくラグーン」→「今すぐ > スタート」、で表示されます。 > > リンク： > https://rakuten.wamgame.jp/whack/top > > → 下記リンク > https://pointmall.rakuten.co.jp/ > から、「ゲームで貯める」→「ぽこぽこもぐらたたき」→「今すぐ > スタート」、で表示されます。 > > よろしくお願い致します。 > > ### Screenshots
Screenshot 1 ![Screenshot 1](https://cdn.adguardcdn.com/sitereports/atd5vs25z94ww8k00kcckg8gowk4o0kgbo00cf85xc.jpg?nc=1)
Screenshot 2 ![Screenshot 2](https://cdn.adguardcdn.com/sitereports/6236oe2qvnk0gw8804c0wgok8soscwks8prij76zcg.jpg?nc=1)
### System configuration Information | Value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard for Android v2.8.0 System version: | `Hyper OS 3.0` Browser: | Galaxyブラウザ（Samsung Internet Browser） License type: | free AdGuard mode: | VPN HTTPS filtering: | enabled Tracking protection: | disabled DNS filtering: | disabled Filters: | Ad blocking:

issue.title: akasha.cv
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Incorrect Blocking) [https://akasha.cv/](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fakasha.cv%2F) ### Comment > Adguard detect the search field where it's written "enter UID/Nickname" and blocks it. This search field is used in order to search players characters builds for the game genshin impact... it's basically like a ladder board for players to compare builds etc ### Screenshots

issue.title: www.itv.com
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Anti Adblock Script) [https://www.itv.com/watch/emmerdale/Ya0524/1a8694a10495](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.itv.com%2Fwatch%2Femmerdale%2FYa0524%2F1a8694a10495) ### Comment > Had this mid to late last year, the report was closed due to the tester not being able to replicate results however the whole reddit thread agreed they too were having issues. Suddenly after 2-3 weeks it began working again. Today I migrated to a new Mac M4 Max and with the EXACT same settings ITV are detecting AdGuard, however on my older intel MacBook running the EXACT same settings and same web login it is perfectly fine? So perhaps an OS issue. > > Older Intel MacBook is running Sequoia 15.7.3 ### Screenshots

issue.body:
# ATTENTION

> [!NOTE]  
> YouTube changes their detection scripts regularly. That means that sometime you can face the detection message.
> If all the following instructions do not work, please **email filters@adguard.com** or wait until any update is available. 

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use another adblocker in the same time because using another adblocker can delay/lags the YouTube loading (e.g., AdBlock Plus and AdBlock)[^1] OR interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!CAUTION] 
> Please do not use an userscript related to the bypassing YouTube detection message like [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing).
> Recently, YouTube anti-adblock script added infinite dummy advertisements to try to neutralize the userscript. ( [TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing#264](https://github.com/TheRealJoelmatic/RemoveAdblockThing/issues/264) )

> [!WARNING]
> Please check that there no another web browser extension that has adblocking feature is enabled on your web browser. It can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.

> [!IMPORTANT]  
> Saving memory feature of your web browser or sleep feature of your operating system can interfere AdGuard's filtering functionality.
> In this case, please re-enable AdGuard's filtering by toggling the protection toggle.
> Following the instructions can be needed.

### The instructions
1. Force to update the filters by clicking the reload button in AdGuard Browser Extension/AdGuard mobile or update tray menu in your system tray. [^2]
2. Reload the YouTube webpage without cache by pressing <kbd>Ctrl</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd> [^3].
3. Clear cache, cookies and site data of your web browser.
4. Re-open your web browser completely (checking your system monitor[^4] will be better).

[^1]: https://gitlab.com/adblockinc/ext/adblockplus/adblockplusui/-/issues/1576
[^2]: [AdGuard for Windows](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-windows/overview/#tray-menu); [AdGuard for Mac](https://adguard.com/kb/adguard-for-mac/overview/#updates-check); 
[^3]: On macOS, <kbd>Command</kbd> + <kbd>Shift</kbd> + <kbd>R</kbd>
[^4]: Task Manager on Windows, System Monitor on GNOME Shell, KDE System Guard on KDE Plasma or Activity Monitor on macOS. 


Previous issue https://github.com/AdguardTeam/AdguardFilters/issues/198973
